name: Tuki's Island
description:
Tuki's Island

Guide Tuki through the beach and catch fish for tonight's dinner. 

Everyone in the island loves fish, try to catch as many as you can. The more fish you catch, the better dinner becomes.

Oh, and watch out for the Octuids! They also like fish, and can shoot ink to steal them from you, if you're carrying any. Be sure to drop the fish in the basket every once in a while so you don't lose them.

---

Controls

MOVE:                      [W] + [S]

CAMERA:                [A] + [D]

JUMP:                        [Spacebar]

---
